product.name: Unlocked.Me
product.shortDescription: Perfect for busy students, through free digital banking, this account gives you quick and easy access to cash.

benefits: ZERO fees on cash deposits of up to R3 000 at Nedbank ATMs. (Thereafter pay-as-you-use fees will apply).
ZERO fees on internal debit and stop orders
ZERO fees for one external debit order (non-Nedbank).
ZERO data usage when banking with the Nedbank MoneyApp™.
ZERO annual fees on your cheque card.
ZERO fees for balance enquiries and inter-account transfers on the MoneyApp™ and all other self-service platforms
Ability to make online purchases with your card.
Free access to the www.unlocked.me experience and major discounts on the site.
Pay-as-you-use fees will apply on other transactions, see the pricing guide
MyPocket - a free budgeting and savings pocket linked to your bank account. It earns you interest and gives you instant access to your money. For more info click here.

features.name: My Pocket
features.description: Get a free budgeting and savings pocket linked to your Nedbank current account to earn interest and get instant access to your money when you need it.

features.name: First ten selected transactions are free, with a maximum of four ATM withdrawals
features.shortDescription: First ten selected transactions are free, with a maximum of four ATM withdrawals

features.name: Digital banking allows you to purchase prepaid electricity and LOTTO tickets
features.shortDescription: Digital banking allows you to purchase prepaid electricity and LOTTO tickets

features.name: Airtime without airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime by dailing *130*001#)
features.shortDescription: Airtime without airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime by dailing *130*001#)

features.name: Send-iMali (send money to a cellphone number by dailing *120*001#)
features.shortDescription: Send-iMali (send money to a cellphone number by dailing *120*001#)

features.name: eNotes
features.description: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No Funds Alert Services
features.description: No funds alert is a service that provides a delay of the transactions being returned,due to insufficient funds in the account. Helping you save on unnecessary dishonoured penalty fees.

features.name: Affinity Programmes
features.shortDescription: At no cost to you, through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.

features.name: Salary Switching
features.description: Our free salary switching service will provide you with a confirmation of banking details to take to your employer for a quicker and simpler switch. Your overdraft will activate once your first salary is deplosited.

features.name: Debit Order Switching
features.description: If this is going to be your main account, we can, where possible, help you move your debit orders to your new Nedbank account for free,or you can download the MoneyApp and do it yourself.

salesHighlights.question: Can I use my card at toll gates?
Can I do online transactions?
salesHighlights.answer: Yes, you can do local and international online transactions.

salesHighlights.question: Will my card be delivered or do I need to collect it?
When will my card be available?
